name: Throne
description: Throne, inspired by Legends of the Three Kingdoms, creates an immersive gaming atmosphere where players could be in different characters and occupation to fight for themselves and their nations. What players may find appealing and intriguing is they did not know what their nation is when first entering the game. They need to use their functions cards to complete the tasks within each country to obtain the clues of finding their identity and help their nation to achieve the final victory.
